VoiceList.Entry: Scarlet “Wow!! That's amazing!”
Scarlet “It's all Materia!!”
Rufus “The outside is rich with Mako energy. The inside is a treasure trove of Materia. This truly is the Promised Land.”
Hojo “There is no such thing as the Promised Land. It's a legend…an old wives tale… …It's utterly ridiculous.”
Rufus “Everything's as I imagined it to be. Isn't it splendid?”
“It is that kind of dullness that makes you a second-rate scientist.”
Rufus “What's happening?”
Scarlet “It's coming from within the wall! Something's in there! It's moving!”
Hojo “Weapon…”
Hojo “Then it really does exist… I didn't believe in it.”
Rufus “What does this mean?”
Hojo “…Weapon. A monster created by the Planet.”
“They appear when the Planet's in danger and destroy everything.”
“That's what was stated in Professor Gast's report.”
Rufus “I never saw that report… Where is it?”
Hojo “Here,right here.”
Rufus “You keep a lot of things to yourself.”
Scarlet “Mr. President… I've got a bad feeling about this place…”
Rufus “Hmm…maybe we should go back to our ship now.”
“We need to prepare for the inspection anyway.”
Scarlet “Hey!!! Where did you come from?”
Cloud “…Don't know…”
Cloud “This place is going to get rough.”
“Better leave things to me and get out of here while you still can!!”
Rufus “Leave things to you? Hmph…I don't know what you mean.”
Cloud “This is where the Reunion is happening. Where everything begins and ends.”
Tifa “Cloud?”
Barret “Hey! We're here to help you!”
Red XIII “I'm here! I'm here to help you,Cloud!”
Cloud “Thanks…Barret. Where's the Black Materia?”
Cloud “Thanks…Red XIII. Where's the Black Materia?”
Barret “It's safe. I have it.”
Red XIII “It's safe. I'm holding on to it.”
Cloud “I'll take it from here. Give me the…Black Materia.”
Barret “You alright?”
Red XIII “Are you all right,Cloud?”
Barret “Okay then,here. Had a lot of pressure holding this thing.”
Red XIII “Then…here you go. I was a little apprehensive holding this thing.”
Cloud “Thanks. Leave the rest to me.”
Cloud “Sorry to make you worry, but I'm all right now.”
Cloud “I'll make sure that the Black Materia is delivered.”
Tifa “Cloud!!”
Cloud “Everyone,thanks for everything. And…I'm sorry.”
Cloud “…Sorry.”
Cloud “…Sorry.”
Cloud “Especially you,Tifa. I'm really sorry.”
“You've been so good to me… I don't know what to say…”
Cloud “I never lived up to being 'Cloud'.”
“Tifa… Maybe one day you'll meet the real 'Cloud'.”
Cloud “Professor Hojo…”
Hojo “Ha,ha,ha… this is perfect!!!”
“It means that my experiment was a complete success.”
Hojo “What number were you? Huh? Where is your tattoo?”
Cloud “Professor Hojo… I don't have a number.”
“You didn't give me one because you said I was a failed experiment.”
Hojo “What?”
Hojo “What the--? You mean only a failure made it here?”
Cloud “I didn't know the 'Reunion' already started.”
“But,here I am. And I brought the Black Materia with me Just as Sephiroth wanted.”
Hojo “Shut up,miserable failure…”
Cloud “Professor…please give me a number. Please,Professor…”
Cloud “Won't you give me one? …Professor?”
Hojo “I never dreamed what I thought was a success…was actually a failure, and that which I considered a failure was my greatest success…”
Rufus “What are you guys talking about?”
Tifa “You can't hear my voice?”
Tifa “You can't hear my voice?”
Tifa “No,don't!!! Please! Stop Cloud!”
Tifa “Cloud!!”
Hojo “Did you see it!! It's Sephiroth! So he IS here!”
Hojo “This is perfect! Both Jenova's Reunion and Sephiroth's will!”
“They won't be diffused into the Lifestream,”
“but gathered here! Mwa,haa,ha…”
Tifa “What are you so happy about,Professor? You know what this means,don't you?”
Tifa “Cloud has the Black Materia!”
Tifa “Sephiroth is going to summon Meteor! Every single person is going to die!”
Rufus “Whatever I say now is too little… too late. We must evacuate.”
Rufus “I want you all to come with me. There's still much more I want to know.”
Barret “Yo! Cloud! Stop! Don't do it!”
Red XIII “Cloud,NO! Stop! Please!”
Tifa “Cloud!!”
